Algorithms
About

Networkx

Jun 25, 2018

Install

$ python -mpip install -U matplotlib

$ easy_install networkx

Import

import networkx as nx

Create Graph

G = nx.Graph()

Directed Graph

DG = nx.DiGraph()

Graph Manipulation

Add Nodes

G.add_node(1)
G.add_nodes_from([2,3])

Add Edges

G.add_edge(1,2)

Adding Weight

G[1][2]['weight'] = 4
G.edges[3,4]['weight'] = 4.2

Removal

G.remove_node(2)
G.remove_edge(1,3)

Graph Attributes

G.number_of_nodes()
G.number_of_edges()

nodes = list(G.nodes)
edges = list(G.edges)
neighbors = list(G.adj[n]) //Neighbors of vertex n
G.degree[node]

DiGraph Attributes

DiGraph.predecessors()

Drawing

  • Import the Matplotlibâ€™s plot interface to draw. 
    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
  • Draw and display a graph 
    nx.draw_shell(G, with_labels=True, font_weight='bold')
plt.show()
